description: The OR_CASE_PREOPDX table contains OR management system case pre-op diagnoses.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the pre-op diagnosis entered for the case.

columns.name: PRE_OP_DX
columns.description: The pre-op diagnosis entered for the case.
